price: 32. Markay arkaan (mu'miniinta) waxay odhan jireen: Kuwakanu waa kuwo lunsan.
arabic: وَإِذَا رَأَوۡهُمۡ قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ لَضَآلُّونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā ra-awhum qālū inna hāulāi laḍāllūna
